events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of May 9th, resulting in damage to the front bumper and headlights.
After review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in the reported collision.
Assigned claims agent Jessica Martinez to the case to guide the customer through the claim process and collect necessary information.
The customer was promptly notified that their auto accident claim has been received and is being processed, ensuring confidence in service.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of the customer’s driver’s license to support the accident claim.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report, photos of the collision, and personal identification.
The investigation team began reviewing the documents and contacting involved parties to verify details of the car accident.
The investigation concluded, confirming liability and the extent of damage to the customer’s vehicle in the reported collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs, including labor and parts replacement for front-end collision damage.
Customer provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of their claim and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement terms for the auto accident damages.
Payment was issued for the approved settlement amount directly to the customer’s bank account as per the agreement.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after full payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
The claim file was archived in the system for long-term record keeping and future reference if needed.
